entities.name: hall of prophecy
entities.description: The location where Harry, Hermione, and Neville are currently at.

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: A group of dark wizards who are enemies of Harry, Hermione, and Neville. They are described as 'ugly baby-headed'.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a wizard who is on the run from Death Eaters.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: A witch and one of Harry's best friends. She tries to cast a spell but is interrupted by the Death Eaters.

entities.name: neville longbottom
entities.description: Another wizard and friend of Harry and Hermione. He gets thrown over a desk during the battle.

relationships.description: Harry is being chased by Death Eaters, who are trying to kill him.
Hermione is also being chased by Death Eaters, who are trying to kill her.
Neville is being chased by Death Eaters, who are trying to kill him.
Harry and Hermione are friends and are working together to evade the Death Eaters.
Harry and Neville are friends and are working together to evade the Death Eaters.
